SEARCH
Package CommonFunctions

Class Command

java.lang.Object
CommonFunctions.Command
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Command extends Object implements Serializable
The Command class represents a command with its associated operations and arguments. It provides methods to extract the root command, obtain a list of operations and their corresponding arguments, and check for the presence of required keys in a given input map
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Command

      public Command(String p_command)
      Constructs a Command instance with the provided command string. Trims leading and trailing spaces and ensures single spaces between words.
      Parameters:
      p_command - The command string to be processed.

  • Method Details

    • getRootCommand

      public String getRootCommand()
      Retrieves the root command from the original command string.
      Returns:
      The root command.

    • getOperationsAndArguments

      public List<Map<String,String>> getOperationsAndArguments()
      Parses the command string to extract a list of operations and their corresponding arguments.
      Returns:
      A list of maps where each map represents an operation and its associated arguments.

    • checkRequiredKeysPresent

      public boolean checkRequiredKeysPresent(String p_key, Map<String,String> p_inputMap)
      Checks whether a required key is present in the given input map and its associated value is not empty.
      Parameters:
      p_key - The key to check for in the input map.
      p_inputMap - The input map to check against.
      Returns:
      true if the key is present and its associated value is not empty, otherwise false.

    • getD_command

      public String getD_command()
      Getter for the command.
      Returns:
      command in string
